wired.title: Ferrari's New Concept Is a Political Statement About the Problems With F1
wired.topComment: The one thing that drove me away from F1 years ago-- Bernie Ecclestone. Remarkably, NASCAR is on the same track of self-immolation via regulation.

wired.title: Pixar and Google Employees Are Vaccinating Their Kids, Say Pixar and Google
wired.topComment:
>Unless children attending California day cares have
>an immunization exemption because of a medical issue
